Class TcpConnection

    • Ace

              • whiz.net.clients.TcpConnection
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    POP3Connector, SMTPConnector, TcpConnector

    public class TcpConnection
extends NetworkConnection
    Useful TCP connection class.
